people_also_ask.question: Is Aquapaw still in business?
people_also_ask.heading: The Aquapaw guys continued on with their business successfully. They sell on Amazon, Chewy, Petco, their own website and many other pet retailers. As of June, 2021, the company is still in business with annual revenue of $4 million.
people_also_ask.title: AquaPaw - Shark Tank Blog

people_also_ask.question: How do I wash my dog myself?
people_also_ask.heading: Here's the bathing process our pros recommend:
people_also_ask.title: How to Properly Bathe a Dog: A Pro Groomer's Top Tips
snippet_data: Coax or place your dog in the tub or wash station. Treats are a great way to get the process off to a positive start!
Wet your dog using warm water. ...
Rinse well until there is no more product on the fur.
